flawed_nl_solution:
If Yola currently weighs 220 pounds, then Wanda, who weighs 30 pounds more than Yola, weighs 220+30 = <<220+30=220>>220 pounds.
Wanda also weighs 80 pounds more than Yola did 2 years ago, meaning Yola weighed 220-80=<<220-80=140>>140 pounds 2 years ago.
#### 140

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 250, not 220. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
